code: import React from'react';import{Header,Menu}from'semantic-ui-react';import{useLocation,Link}from'react-router-dom';var TopMenu=function TopMenu(_ref){var user=_ref.user;var location=useLocation();return React.createElement(Menu,{pointing:true,color:"blue",fixed:"top",widths:2,style:{backgroundColor:"white"}},React.createElement(Menu.Item,{active:location.pathname==="/"|location.pathname==="/workouts",as:Link,to:"/workouts"},React.createElement(Header,{as:"h4",icon:"stopwatch",color:"blue",content:"Workout"})),React.createElement(Menu.Item,{active:location.pathname==="/profile",as:Link,to:"/profile"},React.createElement(Header,{as:"h4",color:"blue",content:user?"My Profile":"Sign In",icon:"user"})));};export default TopMenu;
